alert.note: Alert for Uintah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 26 at 2:15PM MDT until further notice by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Utah... Green River near Jensen affecting Uintah County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding warm temperatures and snowmelt. * WHERE...Green River near Jensen. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Minor lowland flooding is occurring along the Green River. Agricultural land near the river...irrigation and a few out buildings are impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM MDT Friday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate near bankfull conditions this weekend, then is expected to exceed banks early next week with a maximum value of 9.3 feet by Monday afernoon. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.8 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Green River Jensen 10.8 8.9 Fri 1 pm MDT 8.9 9.0 9.3 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the advisory area, remain alert to possible flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
